name: This is a duck
description:
Godot 4 exports don't work on Firefox, because Firefox/Safari doesn't support SharedArrayBuffer. only chrome-based browsers; Chrome, Chromium, Opera, Brave, etc. work.

Comrade! Your ducks have revolutionized the world! Make more of your ducks NOW, for the union!

push duck into train to deliver out - 3 errors per order, and you can send orders out in multiple separate batches.

Modify ducks by pushing them onto the belts through the assembly module, stats are added from blocks touching the assembly module. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made for the Godot Wild Jam #53 - Theme: Assembly - Wildcard: 4 color limit

Music by Kor: https://korishere.com/ / https://twitter.com/korishere

Rest by me: https://www.youtube.com/@kobe_mano

My first release and my first game jam, I'm gonna make a dev-log on youtube about it.

SFX: https://filmcow.itch.io/filmcow-sfx

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD or arrows = move

space or enter = wait or push buttons

esc or Q = menu

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Features to add:

  • Chaining on mod blocks, so can add more than 2 stats per assembly crunch.
  • Supply vs Demand of ducks.
  •  currently ducks can walk on same tile as player, I need to try and fix, as it can be annoying. Just make pushing ducks easier
